solution_line_template: If {earrings_per_pair} pair of earrings equals {earrings_per_pair} earrings, then Barbie bought {pairs_bought}*{earrings_per_pair}=<<{pairs_bought}*{earrings_per_pair}={total_earrings_barbie_bought}>>{total_earrings_barbie_bought} earrings.

If receiving {earrings_given_to_alissa} earrings tripled Alissa's collection, then she now has {earrings_given_to_alissa}*{triple_factor}=<<{earrings_given_to_alissa}*{triple_factor}={alissa_total_earrings}>>{alissa_total_earrings} earrings.
